key_risks: Geopolitical instability in Eastern Europe, particularly in Belarus and Ukraine
Economic sensitivity to reduced IT spending during downturns
Client concentration risk due to reliance on a few large clients
Talent retention challenges in a competitive IT services industry
controversies: Lawsuit in *CKSJB Holdings LLC v. EPAM Systems Inc.* (2020) alleging breach of contractual duty and promissory estoppel
environmental_issues: Increased focus on sustainability and green IT solutions
social_issues: Flexible work environment, wellness programs, and career development opportunities
governance_issues: Emphasis on high ethical and legal standards in operations

sources.title: CKSJB Holdings LLC v. EPAM Systems Inc, No. 19-1951 (3d Cir. 2020)
sources.snippet: CKSJB Holdings, LLC, appeals the dismissal of its amended complaint against EPAM Systems, Inc., alleging breach of a contractual duty to negotiate in good faith and promissory estoppel. CKSJB, as successor in interest to PointSource, LLC, brought this action after negotiations with EPAM for the potential acquisition of PointSource broke down.
